widget.name: TurtleCoin Paper Wallet Generator
widget.description:
TurtleCoin Paper Wallet Generator
This app lets you quickly generate a paper wallet for TurtleCoin, a fun, fast and easy cryptocurrency. Your keys are 100% safe, and you can check the source for this tool at- https://github.com/turtlecoin/paper-turtle.git
Know that you cannot spend or view your funds with yet, you have to download a desktop wallet for that (web wallet and mobile wallet in the works!).
You can learn more about TurtleCoin at- https://turtlecoin.lol Come and chat with us over at- http://chat.turtlecoin.lol
Enjoy! :)
widget.author: Sajo8TRTL
